== Kottakkal (CT) (627527) ==

Kottakkal (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 20.45 sq. km. and harbouring 8488 households with total population of 44382 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 18 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 350 km. Male population is 20911 and female population is 23471. Scheduled Caste population is 1171 and Scheduled Tribes population is 113. Census Location Code of the town is 627527<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 18 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Tirur at a distance of 19 km.
